verses.arabic: كٓهيعٓصٓ
verses.english: Kaf, Ha, Ya, 'Ayn, Sad.

verses.arabic: ذِكْرُ رَحْمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبْدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ
verses.english: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
verses.hausa: Ambaton rahamar Ubangijinka ne ga BawanSa Zakariyya.

verses.arabic: إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيًّا
verses.english: When he called to his Lord a private supplication.
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ya kirãyi Ubangijinsa, kira ɓõyayye.

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ ٱلْعَظْمُ مِنِّى وَٱشْتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأْسُ شَيْبًا وَلَمْ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, indeed my bones have weakened, and my head has filled with white, and never have I been in my supplication to You, my Lord, unhappy.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Lalle ne nĩ, ƙashi na daga gare ni ya yi rauni, kuma kaina ya kunnu da furfura, kuma ban kasance marashin arziki ba game da kiranKa, yã Ubangiji!"

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى خِفْتُ ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ مِن وَرَآءِى وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا فَهَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّا
verses.english: And indeed, I fear the successors after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle nĩ, na ji tsõron dangi a bãyãna, kuma mãtãta ta kasance bakarãriya! Sai ka bã ni wani mataimaki daga wajenKa."

verses.arabic: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنْ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَٱجْعَلْهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا
verses.english: Who will inherit me and inherit from the family of Jacob. And make him, my Lord, pleasing [to You]."
verses.hausa: "Ya gãjẽ ni, kuma ya yi gãdo daga gidan Yãƙũba. Kuma Ka sanya shi yardajje, yã Ubangiji!"

verses.arabic: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّا
verses.english: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. We have not assigned to any before [this] name."
verses.hausa: (Allah Ya karɓa) "Yã zakariyya! Lalle ne Mũ, Munã yi maka bushãra da wani yãro, sunansa Yahaya. Ba Mu sanya masa wani takwara ba a gabãni."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا وَقَدْ بَلَغْتُ مِنَ ٱلْكِبَرِ عِتِيًّا
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, how will I have a boy when my wife has been barren and I have reached extreme old age?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijĩna! Yãya wani yãro zai kasance a gare ni, alhãli kuwa mãtãta ta kasance bakarãriya, kuma gã shi nã kai ga matuƙa ta tsũfa?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ وَقَدْ خَلَقْتُكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ تَكُ شَيْـًٔا
verses.english: [An angel] said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, for I created you before, while you were nothing.' "
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kamar wancan Ubangijinka Ya ce. Shĩ, a gare Ni mai sauƙi ne, kuma haƙĩƙa Na halitta ka a gabãnin haka, alhãli ba ka kasance kõme ba."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةً ۚ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَ لَيَالٍ سَوِيًّا
verses.english: [Zechariah] said, "My Lord, make for me a sign." He said, "Your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three nights, [being] sound."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Ka sanya mini alãma." Ya ce: "Alamarka ita ce ka kãsa yi wa mutãne magana a darũruwa uku daidai."

verses.arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْمِحْرَابِ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ أَن سَبِّحُوا۟ بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
verses.english: So he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and signaled to them to exalt [Allah] in the morning and afternoon.
verses.hausa: Sai ya fita a kan mutãnensa daga masallãci, sa'an nan ya yi ishãra zuwa gare su da cẽwa, "Ku yi tasbĩhi sãfe da yamma."

verses.arabic: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا
verses.english: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy
verses.hausa: Yã Yahaya! Ka kãma littãfi da ƙarfi. Kuma Muka bã shi hukunci yanã yãro.

verses.arabic: وَحَنَانًا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةً ۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيًّا
verses.english: And affection from Us and purity, and he was fearing of Allah
verses.hausa: Kuma (Muka sanya shi) abin girmamãwa daga gunMu, kuma mai albarka, kuma ya kasance mai ɗã'ã da taƙawa.

verses.arabic: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ وَلَمْ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيًّا
verses.english: And dutiful to his parents, and he was not a disobedient tyrant.
verses.hausa: Kuma mai biyayya ga mahaifansa biyu, kuma bai kasance mai girman kai mai sãɓo ba.

verses.arabic: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْهِ يَوْمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوْمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ يُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
verses.english: And peace be upon him the day he was born and the day he dies and the day he is raised alive.
verses.hausa: Kuma aminci ya tabbata a gare shi a rãnar da aka haife shi da rãnar da yake mutuwa da rãnar da ake tãyar da shi yanã mai rai.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًا شَرْقِيًّا
verses.english: And mention, [O Muhammad], in the Book [the story of] Mary, when she withdrew from her family to a place toward the east.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ambaci Maryamu a cikin Littãfi, a lõkacin da ta tsallake daga mutãnenta a wani wuri, a gẽfen gabas.

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ مِن دُونِهِمْ حِجَابًا فَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرًا سَوِيًّا
verses.english: And she took, in seclusion from them, a screen. Then We sent to her Our Angel, and he represented himself to her as a well-proportioned man.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan ta riƙi wani shãmaki daga barinsu. Sai Muka aika rũhinMu zuwa gare ta. Sai ya bayyana a gare ta da siffar mutum madaidaci.

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيًّا
verses.english: She said, "Indeed, I seek refuge in the Most Merciful from you, [so leave me], if you should be fearing of Allah."
verses.hausa: Ta ce: "Lalle nĩ inã nẽman tsari ga Mai, rahama daga gare ka, idan ka kasance mai tsaron addini!"

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَـٰمًا زَكِيًّا
verses.english: He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Abin sani kawai, ni Manzon Ubangijinki ne dõmin in bãyar da wani yãro tsarkakke gare ki."

verses.arabic: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّا
verses.english: She said, "How can I have a boy while no man has touched me and I have not been unchaste?"
verses.hausa: Ta ce: "A inã yãro zai kasance a gare ni alhãli kuwa wani mutum bai shãfe ni ba, kuma ban kasance kãruwa ba?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ ۖ وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحْمَةً مِّنَّا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرًا مَّقْضِيًّا
verses.english: He said, "Thus [it will be]; your Lord says, 'It is easy for Me, and We will make him a sign to the people and a mercy from Us. And it is a matter [already] decreed.' "
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kamar wancan Ubangijinki Ya ce. Shĩ, a gare Ni mai sauƙi ne. Kuma dõmin Mu sanya shi wata alãma ga mutãne, kuma wata rahama ce daga gare Mu.' Kuma abin yã kasance wani al'amari hukuntacce."

verses.arabic: فَحَمَلَتْهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتْ بِهِۦ مَكَانًا قَصِيًّا
verses.english: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.
verses.hausa: Sai ta yi cikinsa, sai ta tsallake da shi ga wani wuri mai nĩsa.

verses.arabic: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلْمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ قَالَتْ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى مِتُّ قَبْلَ هَـٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسْيًا مَّنسِيًّا
verses.english: And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She said, "Oh, I wish I had died before this and was in oblivion, forgotten."
verses.hausa: Sai nãƙuda ta kai ta zuwa ga wani kututturen dabĩniya, ta ce "Kaitona, dã dai na mutu a gabãnin wannan kuma na kasance wani abu wulakantacce wanda aka manta!"

verses.arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّا
verses.english: But he called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream.
verses.hausa: Sai (yãron da ta haifa) ya kira ta daga ƙarƙashinta, "Kada ki yi baƙin ciki! Haƙĩƙa Ubangijinki Ya sanya wani marmaro a ƙarƙashinki.

verses.arabic: وَهُزِّىٓ إِلَيْكِ بِجِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ تُسَـٰقِطْ عَلَيْكِ رُطَبًا جَنِيًّا
verses.english: And shake toward you the trunk of the palm tree; it will drop upon you ripe, fresh dates.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ki girgiza zuwa gare ki game da kututturen dabĩnon ya zuba a kanki yanã 'ya'yan dabĩno, ruɗabi nunannu."

verses.arabic: فَكُلِى وَٱشْرَبِى وَقَرِّى عَيْنًا ۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلْبَشَرِ أَحَدًا فَقُولِىٓ إِنِّى نَذَرْتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ صَوْمًا فَلَنْ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنسِيًّا
verses.english: So eat and drink and be contented. And if you see from among humanity anyone, say, 'Indeed, I have vowed to the Most Merciful abstention, so I will not speak today to [any] man.' "
verses.hausa: "Sai ki ci kuma ki sha kuma ki ji sanyi ga idãnunki. To, idan kin ga wani aya daga mutãne, sai ki ce, 'Lalle nĩ, na yi alwãshin azumi dõmin Mai rahama sabõda haka bã zan yi wa wani mutum magana ba."

verses.arabic: فَأَتَتْ بِهِۦ قَوْمَهَا تَحْمِلُهُۥ ۖ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ لَقَدْ جِئْتِ شَيْـًٔا فَرِيًّا
verses.english: Then she brought him to her people, carrying him. They said, "O Mary, you have certainly done a thing unprecedented.
verses.hausa: Sai ta je wa mutãnenta tanã auke da shi. Suka ce: "Yã Maryamu! Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa kin zo da wani abu mai girma!

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأُخْتَ هَـٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمْرَأَ سَوْءٍ وَمَا كَانَتْ أُمُّكِ بَغِيًّا
verses.english: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste."
verses.hausa: "Yã 'yar'uwar Hãrũna! Ubanki bai kasance mutumin alfãsha ba, kuma uwarki ba ta kasance kãruwa ba."

verses.arabic: فَأَشَارَتْ إِلَيْهِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ كَيْفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ صَبِيًّا
verses.english: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child?"
verses.hausa: Sai ta yi ishãra zuwa gare shi, suka ce: "Yãya zã mu yi magana da wanda ya kasance a cikin shimfiar tsumma yanã jãrĩri?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنِّى عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِىَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّا
verses.english: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle ne, nĩ bãwan Allah ne Allah Yã bã ni Littãfi kuma Ya sanya ni Annabi."

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَنِى مُبَارَكًا أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوْصَـٰنِى بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمْتُ حَيًّا
verses.english: And He has made me blessed wherever I am and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I remain alive
verses.hausa: "Kuma Yã sanya ni mai albarka a inda duk na kasance kuma Ya umurce ni da yin salla da zakka matuƙar inã da rai."

verses.arabic: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِى وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْنِى جَبَّارًا شَقِيًّا
verses.english: And [made me] dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me a wretched tyrant.
verses.hausa: "Kuma mai biyayya ga uwãta, kuma bai sanya ni mai kaushin zũciya ba marashin alhẽri."

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
verses.english: And peace is on me the day I was born and the day I will die and the day I am raised alive."
verses.hausa: "Kuma aminci ya tabbata a gare ni a rãnar da aka haife ni da rãnar da nake mutũwa da rãnar da ake tãyar da ni inã mai rai."

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
verses.english: That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute.
verses.hausa: Wancan ne Ĩsã ɗan Maryamu, maganar gaskiya wadda suke shakka a cikinta.

verses.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٍ ۖ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ ۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.english: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
verses.hausa: Bã ya kasancẽwa ga Allah Ya riƙi wani ɗã. Tsarki ya tabbata a gare shi! Idan Yã hukunta wani al'amari sai kawai Ya ce masa, "Kasance." Sai ya dinga kasan cẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.english: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path."
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle Allah ne Ubangijina kuma Ubangijinku, sai ku bauta Masa. Wannan shi ne tafarki madaidaici."

verses.arabic: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن مَّشْهَدِ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.english: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.
verses.hausa: Sai ƙungiyõyin suka sãɓã wa jũna a tsakãninsu. To, bõne ya tabbata ga waɗanda suka kãfirta daga halartar yini mai girma.

verses.arabic: أَسْمِعْ بِهِمْ وَأَبْصِرْ يَوْمَ يَأْتُونَنَا ۖ لَـٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error.
verses.hausa: Mẽne ne ya yi jinsu, kuma mẽne ne ya yi ganinsu a rãnar da suke zo Mana! Amma azzãlumai sunã a cikin ɓata bayyananna.

verses.arabic: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَسْرَةِ إِذْ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ وَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka yi musu gargaɗi da rãnar nadãma a lõkacin da aka hukunta al'amari alhãli kuwa sunã a cikin ɓãta, kuma sũ bã su yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mũ, Mũ ne ke gãdon ƙasa da wanda yake a kanta, kuma zuwa gare Mu ake mayar da su.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
verses.english: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
verses.hausa: Kuma ambaci Ibrãhĩm a cikin Littafi. Lalle shi ya kasance mai yawan gaskatãwa, Annabi.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعْبُدُ مَا لَا يَسْمَعُ وَلَا يُبْصِرُ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنكَ شَيْـًٔا
verses.english: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all?
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da ya ce wa ubansa, "Yã bãba! Don me kake bauta wa abin da bã ya ji, kuma bã ya ga ni, kuma ba ya wadãtar da kõme daga barinka?"

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى قَدْ جَآءَنِى مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَمْ يَأْتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ أَهْدِكَ صِرَٰطًا سَوِيًّا
verses.english: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path.
verses.hausa: "Yã bãba! Lalle ni, haƙĩƙa abin da bai je maka ba na ilmi ya zo mini, sabõda haka ka bĩ ni in shiryar da kai wani tafarki madaidaici."

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَصِيًّا
verses.english: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.
verses.hausa: "Yã bãba! Kada ka bauta wa Shaiɗan. Lalle Shaiɗan ya kasance mai saɓãwa ga Mai rahama."

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٌ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيًّا
verses.english: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]."
verses.hausa: "Yã bãba! Lalle ne ni inã tsõron wata azãba daga Mai rahama ta shãfe ka, har ka zama masõyi ga Shaiɗan."

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنْ ءَالِهَتِى يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ وَٱهْجُرْنِى مَلِيًّا
verses.english: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ashe, mai gudu ne kai daga gumãkãna? Yã Ibrãĩm! Lalle ne, idan ba ka hanu ba, haƙĩ ƙa, zan jẽfe ka. Kuma ka ƙaurace mini tun kanã mai mutunci."

verses.arabic: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ ۖ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا
verses.english: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Aminci ya tabbata a gare ka! zan nẽmi Ubangijina Ya gãfarta maka. Lalle Shi Ya kasance Mai girmamãwa gare ni."

verses.arabic: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّا
verses.english: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy."
verses.hausa: "Kuma inã nĩsantar ku da abin da kuke kira, baicin Allah kuma inã kiran Ubangijina, tsammãnin kada in zama marashin arziki game da kiran Ubangijina."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا نَبِيًّا
verses.english: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet.
verses.hausa: To, sa'ad da ya nĩsance su da abin da suke bautãwa baicin Allah, Muka bã shi Is'hãƙa da Ya'aƙuba alhãli kuwa kõwanensu Mun mayar da shi Annabi.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِنَا وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ عَلِيًّا
verses.english: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yi musu kyauta daga RahamarMu, kuma Muka sanya musu harshen gaskiya maɗaukaki.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخْلَصًا وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
verses.english: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ambaci Mũsã a cikin Littãfi. Lalle ne shi, yã kasance zãɓaɓɓe, kuma yã kasance Manzo, Annabi.

verses.arabic: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنِ وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ نَجِيًّا
verses.english: And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him].
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka kira shi daga gẽfen dũtse na dãma kuma Muka kusanta shi yanã abõkin gãnãwa.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ نَبِيًّا
verses.english: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yi masa kyauta daga RahamarMu da ɗan'uwansa Hãrũna, ya zama Annabi.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
verses.english: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ambaci Ismã'ila a cikin Littãfi. Lalle shi, yã kasance mai gaskiyar alkawari, kuma yã kasance Manzo, Annabi.

verses.arabic: وَكَانَ يَأْمُرُ أَهْلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرْضِيًّا
verses.english: And he used to enjoin on his people prayer and zakah and was to his Lord pleasing.
verses.hausa: Kuma yã kasance yanã umurnin mutãnens da salla da zakka. Kuma yã kasance yardajje a wurin Ubangijinsa.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
verses.english: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ambaci Idrĩsa a cikin Littãfi. Lalle shi, ya kasance mai yawan gaskatãwa, Annabi.

verses.arabic: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا
verses.english: And We raised him to a high station.
verses.hausa: Muka ɗaukaka shi a wuri maɗaukaki.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوحٍ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنْ هَدَيْنَا وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَبُكِيًّا ۩
verses.english: Those were the ones upon whom Allah bestowed favor from among the prophets of the descendants of Adam and of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose. When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they fell in prostration and weeping.
verses.hausa: Waɗancan sũ ne waɗanda Allah Ya yi wa ni'ima daga Annabãwa daga zurriyar Ãdamu, kuma daga waɗanda muka ɗauka tãre da Nũhu, kuma daga zurriyar Ibrãhĩm da Isrã'ila, kuma daga waɗanda Muka shiryar kuma Muka zãɓe su. Idan anã karãtun ãyõyin Mai rahama a kansu, sai su fãɗi sunã mãsu sujada kuma mãsu kũka.

verses.arabic: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ أَضَاعُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَلْقَوْنَ غَيًّا
verses.english: But there came after them successors who neglected prayer and pursued desires; so they are going to meet evil -
verses.hausa: Sai waɗansu 'yan bãya suka maye a bãyansu suka tõzarta salla, kuma suka bi sha'awõwinsu. To, da sannu zã su hau da wani sharri.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا
verses.english: Except those who repent, believe and do righteousness; for those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged at all.
verses.hausa: Fãce wanda ya tũba, kuma ya yi ĩmãni, kuma ya aikata aiki na ƙwarai. To, waɗannan sunã shiga Aljanna, kuma bã a zãluntar su da kõme.

verses.arabic: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَأْتِيًّا
verses.english: [Therein are] gardens of perpetual residence which the Most Merciful has promised His servants in the unseen. Indeed, His promise has ever been coming.
verses.hausa: Gidãjen Aljannar zama wadda Mai rahama ya yi alkawarin bãyarwa ga bãyinSa (mãsu aikin ĩmãni) a fake. Lalle ne shĩ, alkawarin ya kasance abin riskuwa.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا إِلَّا سَلَـٰمًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ رِزْقُهُمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
verses.english: They will not hear therein any ill speech - only [greetings of] peace - and they will have their provision therein, morning and afternoon.
verses.hausa: Bã su jin yasassar magana a cikinta, fãce sallama. Kuma sunã da abinci, a cikinta, sãfe da maraice.

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا
verses.english: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
verses.hausa: Wancan Aljannar ce wadda Muke gãdar da wanda ya kasance mai aiki da taƙawa daga bãyiNa.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمْرِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِينَا وَمَا خَلْفَنَا وَمَا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا
verses.english: [Gabriel said], "And we [angels] descend not except by the order of your Lord. To Him belongs that before us and that behind us and what is in between. And never is your Lord forgetful -
verses.hausa: (Sunã mãsu cẽwa) "Kuma bã mu sauka Fãce da umuruin Ubangijinka (Muhammad). Shĩ ne da mulkin abin da ke a gaba gare mu da abin da ke a bãyanmu da abin da ke a tsakãnin wannan." Kuma (Ubangijinka bai kasance wanda ake mantãwa ba.

verses.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَٱصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيًّا
verses.english: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him?"
verses.hausa: Shi ne Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa da abin da yake a tsakãninsu. sai ka bauta Masa, kuma ka yi haƙuri ga bautarsa. Shin kã san wani takwara a gare shi?

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا
verses.english: And the disbeliever says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"
verses.hausa: Kuma mutum yana cẽwa, "Shin idan na mutu lalle ne haƙĩ ƙa da sannu zã a fitar da ni inã mai rai?"

verses.arabic: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَيْـًٔا
verses.english: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing?
verses.hausa: Shin, kuma mutum bã zai tuna ba cẽwa lalle ne Mun halitta shi a gabãni, alhãli kuwa bai kasance kõme ba?

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّا
verses.english: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.
verses.hausa: To, Munã rantsuwa da Ubangijinka, lalle ne, Muna tãyar da su da kuma shaianun sa'an nan, kuma lalle Muna halatar da su da kuma Shaiɗanun sa'an nan, kuma, lalle Muna halatar da su a gẽfen Jahannama sunã gurfãne.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عِتِيًّا
verses.english: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma lalle Munã fizge wanda yake mafi tsananin girman kai ga Mai rahama daga kõwace ƙungiya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا
verses.english: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma lalle Mũ ne Mafi sani ga waɗanda suke sũ ne mafiya cancantar ƙõnuwa da ita.

verses.arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا
verses.english: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
verses.hausa: Kuma bãbu kõwa daga gare ku sai mai tuzga mata. Yã kasance wajibi ga Ubangijinka, hukuntacce.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا
verses.english: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Mu tsẽrar da waɗanda suka yi aiki da taƙawa, kuma Mu bar azzãlumai a cikinta gurfãne.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌ مَّقَامًا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّا
verses.english: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association?"
verses.hausa: Kuma idan anã karatun ãyõyinMu, bayyanannu a kansu, sai waɗanda suka kãfirta su ce wa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, "Wanne daga ƙungiyõyin biyu ya fi zama mafi alhẽri ga matsayi, kuma mafi kyaun majalisa?"

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَـٰثًا وَرِءْيًا
verses.english: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance?
verses.hausa: Kuma da yawa daga mutãnen ƙarni Muka halakar a gabãninsu sũ (waɗandaMuka halakar) in ne mafi kyaun kãyan ãki da magãnã.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَدًّا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًا
verses.english: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Wanda ya kasance a cikin ɓata sai Mai rahama Ya yalwata masa yalwatãwa, har idan sun ga abin da ake yi musu wa'adi, imma azãba kõ sã'a, to zã su sani, wane ne yake shĩ ne, mafi sharri ga wuri, kuma mafi rauni ga runduna!"

verses.arabic: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ هُدًى ۗ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ مَّرَدًّا
verses.english: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.
verses.hausa: Kuma Allah na ƙãra wa wa ɗanda suka nẽmi shiryuwa da shiriya. Kuma ayyuka mãsu wanzuwa na ƙwarai ne mafi alhẽri awurin Ubangijinka ga lãda, kuma mafi alhẽri ga makõma.

verses.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا
verses.english: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]?"
verses.hausa: Shin, ka ga wanda ya kãfirta da ayõyinMu, kuma ya ce: "Lalle ne zã a bã ni dũkiya da ɗiya?"

verses.arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلْغَيْبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
verses.english: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?
verses.hausa: Shin, yã tsinkãyi gaibi ne, kõ kuwa yã ɗauki wani alkawari daga Mai rahama ne?

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۚ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ مَدًّا
verses.english: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively.
verses.hausa: Ã'aha! zã mu rubũta abin da yake faɗa, kuma Mu yalwata masa, daga azãba, yalwatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَنَرِثُهُۥ مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأْتِينَا فَرْدًا
verses.english: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.
verses.hausa: Kuma Mu gãde shi ga abin da yake faɗa, kuma ya zo Mana yanã shi kɗai.

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا
verses.english: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka riƙi gumãka, baicin Allah, dõmin su kãsance mataimaka a gare su.

verses.arabic: كَلَّا ۚ سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا
verses.english: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].
verses.hausa: Ã'aha! Zã su kãfirta da ibãdarsu, kuma su kasance maƙiya a kansu.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّا
verses.english: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement?
verses.hausa: Shin, ba ka gani ba cẽwa Mun saki shaiɗanu a kan kãfirai sunã shũshũta su ga zunubi shũshũtãwa?

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا
verses.english: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka kada ka yi gaggawa a kansu, Munã yi musu ƙidãyar ajali ne kawai, ƙidãyãwa.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَفْدًا
verses.english: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation
verses.hausa: A rãnar da Muka tãra mãsu taƙawa zuwa ga Mai rahama sunã bãƙin girma.

verses.arabic: وَنَسُوقُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ وِرْدًا
verses.english: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst
verses.hausa: Kuma Munã kõra mãsu laifi zuwa Jahannama, gargaãwa.

verses.arabic: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
verses.english: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.
verses.hausa: Ba su mal1akar cẽto fãce wanda ya riƙi alkawari a wurin Mai rahama.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًا
verses.english: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Mai rahama Yã riƙi ã!"

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِدًّا
verses.english: You have done an atrocious thing.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne haƙĩƙa kun zo da wani abu mai girman mũni.

verses.arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلْجِبَالُ هَدًّا
verses.english: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation
verses.hausa: Sammai sunã kusa su tsattsage sabõda shi, kuma ƙasa ke kẽce kuma duwãtsu su faɗi sunã karyayyu.

verses.arabic: أَن دَعَوْا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدًا
verses.english: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.
verses.hausa: Dõmin sun yi da'awar ɗã ga Mai rahama.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
verses.english: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.
verses.hausa: Alhãli bã ya kamata ga Mai rahama ya riƙi wani ɗã.

verses.arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَبْدًا
verses.english: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
verses.hausa: Dukkan wanda yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa bai zama ba fãce mai jẽ wa Mai rahama ne yanã bãwã.

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ أَحْصَىٰهُمْ وَعَدَّهُمْ عَدًّا
verses.english: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne haƙĩƙa Yã lissafe su, kuma ya ƙidãye su, ƙidãya.

verses.arabic: وَكُلُّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَرْدًا
verses.english: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
verses.hausa: Kuma dukan kõwanensu mai jẽ Masa ne a Rãnar ¡iyãma yanã shi kaɗai.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
verses.english: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyuka na ƙwarai, Mai rahama zai sanya musu so.

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوْمًا لُّدًّا
verses.english: So, [O Muhammad], We have only made Qur'an easy in the Arabic language that you may give good tidings thereby to the righteous and warn thereby a hostile people.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Ibin sani kawai Mun sauƙaƙar da shi (Alƙur'ãni) a harshenka, dõmin ka yi bushãra da shi ga mãsu aiki da taƙawa kuma ka yi gargaɗi da shi ga mutãne mãsu tsananin husũma.

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًۢا
verses.english: And how many have We destroyed before them of generations? Do you perceive of them anyone or hear from them a sound?
verses.hausa: Kuma da yawa Muka halakar da mutãnen ƙarnõni a gabãninsu. Shin kanã jin mõtsin wani guda daga gare su, kõ kuwa kanã jin wata ɗuriya tãsu?
